QuestData.Title: Shipbuilding
QuestData.Description: The first thing we need to start building ships is a blueprint. With your help, I grabbed some of the best ones from the Iron Docks before we broke out of there.$b$bLet's make sure these don't fall back into the hands of the Iron Horde. Memorize these blueprints, $c, and then destroy the evidence. Let me know when you are done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Learn the blueprints and destroy the evidence.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah, we'll make you a sea-dog yet. Let's get started on our first ship!
